job_posts.title: Software Engineer
job_posts.description: We are seeking a talented and motivated software engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing high-quality software solutions and collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in Java, Python, or similar programming languages
Experience with web application development frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask)
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

job_posts.title: Marketing Manager
job_posts.description: We are looking for an experienced marketing manager to develop and execute marketing strategies to drive customer acquisition, engagement, and retention. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in digital marketing, excellent communication skills, and the ability to lead a team.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
Minimum of 5 years of experience in marketing roles
Expertise in digital marketing channels (e.g., SEO, SEM, social media)
Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to make informed decisions

job_posts.title: Data Scientist
job_posts.description: We are seeking a skilled data scientist to analyze large datasets and generate actionable insights to drive business decisions. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in statistics, machine learning, and programming, with experience in data visualization and storytelling.
requirements: Master's or Ph.D. in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R
Experience with machine learning techniques and algorithms
Strong communication skills and the ability to present complex findings in a clear and concise manner
